name: Mount Doom Adventure
description:
Mount Doom Adventure android game is an adventurous quest of a player to avoid being hit by obstacles falling and rolling in the game screen while getting all the gems inside the cave. The difficulty level progresses while leveling up. The higher level you are; the more obstacles will appear.

The objective of the game is simple, just grab all the gems and you're done with the level. The game offers single screen design with 8 levels of difficulty.

Enjoy, comment, rate and share.
